channel.title: Discord on Adrian's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Discord on Adrian's Blog

item.title: Creating Your Own Discord Bot
item.description: Introduction Have you ever seen a bot in a random Discord server and felt like you wanted to create your own Discord bot? Creating and running your own bot is actually pretty simple and straightforward. Note that in this guide, I will be using Eclipse and JDA to create a bot in java. Also this tutorial assumes you are a Windows 10 user. Since there are many online resources on how to install Java and Eclipse, I won’t go into depth in that regard.
